Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.regionAddress: Address of the region where settlement is created

activateRegion(uint64).details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by mightyCreator

createSettlementByType(uint256,uint64,ui.details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

params.bannerId: Banners token id which will represent to which settlement will be attached to
params.regionId: Region id to which position belongs

createUserSettlement(uint64,uint64,uint2.details: Even though function is opened, it can be called only by world asset

params.bannerId: Banners token id which will represent to which settlement will be attached to
params.regionId: Region id to which position belongs

decreaseTotalCultists(uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by world asset

era().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage and world

increaseTotalCultists(uint256).details: Even though function is opened, it can only be called by world asset

params.initParams: Encoded init params (every world asset has own knowledge how to extract data from it)

restoreUserSettlement(uint64).details: Any address can restore user settlement

world().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage

settlementByPosition.details: Updated when new settlement is created

EraCannotActivateNotIncludedRegion().notice: Thrown when attempting to activate region which is not included to the game

EraCannotActivateRegionMoreThanOnce().notice: Thrown when attempting to activate region more than once

OnlyActiveGame().notice: Thrown when attempting to call action which can only be called in active game (started and not finished)

OnlyMightyCreator().notice: Thrown when attempting to call action which can only be called by mighty creator

OnlyWorldAssetFromSameEra().notice: Thrown when attempting to call action which can only be called by world asset from same era

UserSettlementCannotBeCreatedIfBannerNft.notice: Thrown when attempting to create user settlement with banner nft id which is already taken by another settlement

UserSettlementCannotBeCreatedInInactiveE.notice: Thrown when attempting to create user settlement in inactive era

UserSettlementCannotBeCreatedInRegionWit.notice: Thrown when attempting to create user settlement in region which already has maximum amount of allowed settlement

UserSettlementCannotBeCreatedOnPositionW.notice: Thrown when attempting to create user settlement on position which is not connected to another settlement
Thrown when attempting to create user settlement on position which is to close to another settlement
Thrown when attempting to create user settlement on position with another settlement

UserSettlementCannotBeRestoredFromInacti.notice: Thrown when attempting to restore user settlement from inactive era

UserSettlementCannotBeRestoredIfItsRotte.notice: Thrown when attempting to restore user settlement if it is rotten

ProsperityCreated(address).notice: Emitted when era prosperity is created

ResourceCreated(address,bytes32).notice: Emitted when era resource is created

TileCapturingSystemCreated(address).notice: Emitted when era tile capturing system is created

UnitsCreated(address,bytes32).notice: Emitted when era units is created

WorkersCreated(address).notice: Emitted when era workers is created

regions(uint64).notice: Mapping containing activated regions by provided region id

resources(bytes32).notice: Mapping containing game resources by resource type id

restoreUserSettlement(uint64).notice: Restores settlement from previous era by provided position

settlementByBannerId(uint256).notice: Mapping containing settlement address by provided banner id

settlementByPosition(uint64).notice: Mapping containing settlement by provided position

units(bytes32).notice: Mapping containing units by unit type id

worldAssetFactory().notice: Returns world asset factory from registry
